# MKUserTrackingMode.none

**Case**

The map doesn’t follow the user’s location.

## Declaration

```swift
case none
```

## Constants

- **MKUserTrackingMode.follow**: The map follows the user location.
- **MKUserTrackingMode.followWithHeading**: The map follows the user’s location and rotates when the heading changes.

items.description: The map follows the user location.

items.description: The map follows the user’s location and rotates when the heading changes.
